subject: Hockey, Ice
Children and Childhood
lead_paragraph: The diminutive and prolific St. Louis, who recently retired after a 16-season N.H.L. career, coaches his three sons and other children who play for the Mid Fairfield Junior Rangers in Connecticut.
snippet: The diminutive and prolific St. Louis, who recently retired after a 16-season N.H.L. career, coaches his three sons and other children who play for the Mid Fairfield Junior Rangers in Connecticut.
